title: The Big backyard: the outback of South Australia
creator_credit: Igor Auzins, Peter Dimond and Milton Ingerson Film and Television Productions
brief_description: A young couple, on their honeymoon, travel in a four-wheel drive vehicle to the north and north-eastern areas of South Australia On their journey they see many points of interest including the opal mines of Coober Pedy, Lake Eyre, the Birdsville Track and Sturt’s Stony Desert and the varying barren landscapes of the outback of Australia. Cast: Christina Mackay and Bill Cain. Photographer: David Foreman.
